sense.gloss: to be affectionate to, to treat tenderly, to dote on, to show one's love (for), to cherish
to show favouritism to, to be partial to
to fondle, to caress, to pet
to be tough on, to be rough with, to torment, to train harshly

sdata.j: ↑親↑↓おや↓というものは、どんなに↑腕白↑↓わんぱく↓でも、↑子供↑↓こども↓を↑可愛↑↓|かわい↓がる|ものです。
sdata.e: Parents love their children however naughty they are.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はその↑人形↑↓にんぎょう↓を↑実↑↓み↓の↑妹↑↓いもうと↓のように|かわいがる|。
sdata.e: She loves the doll like her own sister.
